description: With almost twenty years of military and law enforcement experience between them, Rocco and Eli are about to combine their talents and embark on a new adventure. Rocco and Eli are the new owners of Banditos Armory in the historic ...
name: Brothers in Arms

review.name: Why Bother???
review.reviewBody: Touted as a program for firearms enthusiasts, a "Reality" series, it is a total failure.The episode I watched was based around a Bazooka, a WWII shoulder-fired rocket with an explosive warhead. They attempted to build a 19th Century equivalent using black powder.What they built was a large-bore, muzzle-loading musket that fired from on top of the shooter's shoulder. No rocket, no explosive warhead.Their "target" was a Hollywood style special effect explosive that detonated with a satisfying Flash-Boom for the camera. All their targets are the same rigged fireworks. An hour's viewing wasted for special effects. Cancel this... thing... please!
